abstract: European plane maker to invest $600 million to build A320 passenger jets in Alabama.
snippet: European plane maker to invest $600 million to build A320 passenger jets in Alabama.
lead_paragraph: MOBILE, Ala. — Airbus, the European airplane maker, announced Monday that it would invest $600 million over the next five years to build an assembly line here for its popular A320 single-aisle jet — its first factory in the United States.

headline.main: EADS to Build U.S. Assembly Line for Airbus A320
headline.print_headline: Airbus to Build Its First U.S. Factory in Alabama

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: European Aeronautic Defense and Space Co
